Text.Page:
The naga known as {@LinkCreature:42#5006#Maelsaress} is Dagon's highest-ranking officer. She carries a book: The Acts of Dagon.

, I can't tell you how badly we need that book if we're going to defeat the nagas and find their treasure. You're our best hope for getting this done.

Defeating Maelsaress was the next best thing to killing Dagon himself. We're all amazed at what you've been able to accomplish here.

Between you and me, I'd say you're going places in the federation, .
Killing {@LinkCreature:42#5006#Maelsaress} will be a huge blow to the nagas. It would be better to do so quickly.
